document_data.name: Ravos Calantar
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite dragon annual/2000/After the Dragon: The Kingdom of Cormyr Today|65}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Ravos Calantar''' was a member of the [[Calantar]] family, a noble house of [[Cormyr]].
document_data.History: Following the execution of his aunt and matriarch of his family, [[Calantar (Lady)|Lady Calantar]], Ravos came to hate the [[Obarskyr]]s with a passion. By [[1372 DR]], the Cormyrean rulers expected that he was likely to rebel against them.
document_data.Personality:
Ravos was bored with life and sought to perform great deeds.

He enjoyed hunting both [[stag]]s and [[bandit]]s.
